LanguageData.RC2_DrugProcessingBase.label: make drugs
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCigarettes.label: make cigarettes
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCigarettes.description: Roll and prepare tobacco leaves into a pack of cigarettes. Each pack contains 20 cigarettes.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCigars.label: make cigars
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCigars.description: Roll and carefully prepare tobacco leaves into a set of cigars. Far higher quality than plain cigarettes, Cigars are a more tastful form of tobacco.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeSoldierPill.label: make soldier pills
LanguageData.RC2_MakeSoldierPill.description: Prepare and pack nutrients in handy balls known as soldier pills.
